mapper.select: select username, user_id AS userId, age, B.role_name AS position, department, phone_no AS phoneNo from user AS A, role AS B where team_id = #{teamId} and B.role_id = A.role_id

select team_id AS teamId, team_name AS teamName, A.create_datetime AS createDatetime, count(*) AS numMgtPatient from step.team AS A left join step.patient using(team_id) where 1
and ( team_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
group by team_id, team_name, A.create_datetime

select count(*) from step.team AS A where 1
and ( team_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
mapper.insert: insert into step.team( step.team.team_name, step.team.create_datetime, step.team.admin_id ) values ( #{teamName}, NOW(), #{adminId} )
